channel.title: [317] TabboScape [317][Need Dev./ Staff] ASAP
channel.description:
[center][b]Once Again this is Dark Power [Donut In-game] I'm looking for a Development team Once Again This time I'm going to lay down some Info I'm not A Advanced Coder, i only know the Basic Coding! So don't bitch at Me![/b] People I need ASAP: Webclient Developer x1 Private Client Developer x1 or None Depends on the Situation Advanced Coder x1 or x2
My Site: http://tabboscape.webs.com/ My Client: http://up.ht/hKExUs My Msn: Christiansouza@sbcglobal.net
FYI: When the server gets Rolling and we start to recieve a good amount of donation I will pay my staff. - Melee System - 474 God swords [Special/Emote/GFX]. 474 Whip [Emote/GFX]. 474 Vengeance [Emote/GFX]. 474 Vengeance Other [Emote/GFX]. 474 Rune Defender [Block]. Dragon Claws [Emote/GFX][2-hit NPC/4-hit Pvp] Anchor [Emote/No GFX] Melee Following 100%. - Mage System - Autocast 100%. Barrage [Instant] 100%. Mage Following 99%. Blitz [Set Timer = 4 secs.]. 474 Magic Including: ~ Modern. ~Lunar. ~Ancient. Updated Magic Shops [All Runes] - Range System - 474 Crossbow [Emote/GFX]. 474 Cross bow [Emote/GFX]. 474 Range Stand [Emote]. Range Following 99%. - NPC System - I100% Animated Bandos boss / Minions. 100% Animated Zamorak boss / Minions. 100% Animated Saradomin Boss / Minions. 100% Animated Armadyl boss / Minions. - Mini Games - Pest Control 100%. Fight Caves 100% [Wave 1 = Jad]. Fight Pits 100%. Fun Pvp 99%. Barrows 80% - Shops - Shops Are now Placed at Home. Donor Shop [Requires Points]. Party Pete [Donation Shop]. Pvp Shop [Added] - Interface - Donor Point [Displayed in Quest Tab]. 474 Equipment Interface. 474 Items Kept Upon death.[/center] [center][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/j9a9p1.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: [317] TabboScape [317][Need Dev./ Staff] ASAP
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

This is terrible… you’re trying to show off a dragon claws spec and you use an npc with 7 hp. Another thing, I see that you were hit for a 32? Atleast put work into something you’re showing us.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] TabboScape [317][Need Dev./ Staff] ASAP
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I’m sorry, but can you post something that you’ve done that can be considered impressive in todays servers? I can’t tell many servers say “We so advanced we has d claws spec, bandos, arma gs spec, barrows and donor shop!!!”
Could maybe you post some more of the impressive parts of the development that took more challenging coding rather then leeching and the changing of just a few lines?

I guess goodluck, try to do something more original.

Also, don’t take this personally. I want to post this on thousands of topics. I just snapped on yours though.

Read full topic

Other than that, good luck with the development.
